price: Yaya kuke kãficewa da Allah, alhãli kuwa kun kasance matattu sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ku, sa'nnan kuma Ya matar da ku, sa'an nan kuma Ya rãya ku, sa'an nan zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku?
arabic: كَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَكُنتُمۡ أَمۡوَٰتٗا فَأَحۡيَٰكُمۡۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

translations: He will cause you to die
